member.name: T:PHP.Core.Utils
member.summary: Low level unsafe utilities not programmable in unsafe C#.

member.name: M:PHP.Core.Utils.MemCpy(System.Void*,System.Void*,System.Int32)
member.param: The number of bytes to copy.

member.name: M:PHP.Core.Utils.MemFill(System.Byte*,System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills a block of memory by specified byte.
member.param: The address of the first byte of the block to be filled.
The value with to do filling with.
The number of bytes to fill.
